home.name: Myriam Puchalt
welcome: a full stack Web Developer based in London

description: A fast learning, competent person able to solve problems. Very organised, able to multi-task and also great at time management.
Hard-working, with the ability to work with a high degree of autonomy but also in a team environment.
With a passion to learn, motivated, self-confident and with great communication skills.

experience.title: Lead Developer
description: Led the IBMid Migration from IDaaS to IBM Cloud Identity, which involved replacing the underlying authentication service component of IBMid, IDaaS, by the commercial service: Cloud Identity. I managed the technical work, coordinated with teams in Mexico and India and deployed the changes without issues

Led the transition into London of an old .NET project that triggered PagerDuty Alerts nearly every day. After 2 month of owning the project the errors got reduced by a 95%, saving development time and leaving only external dependencies as the main trigger for alerts
Trained to become a Software `Craftwoman` and advised others how to deliver good work, focusing on DDD, CI/CD best practices and Extreme Programming values, principles and practices
Introduced Spotify Squad Health Check to the team and analysed 11 dimensions, improving the Squad Health by a 40% in only 4 months
Created an efficient Squad, led by trust, transparency and hard work, where people felt safe to speak up and where team work is the main core value

experience.title: Full Stack Software Developer
description: Worked as an experienced developer for the `My Sales Activity` Squad, bringing expertise, guidance and mentoring to the less experienced members of the team

Developed a new Deal Registration Process for Software products using React and IBM's Carbon Design System. It allowed IBM's Business Partners to easily apply for software incentives and register their deals. The likelihood to recommend the product went from a 5.2/10 to a 7.2/10 because we took a design led approach when developing the application and it became easy to use and understand, intuitive and it also saved around 30' of time when using the tool

Worked on the implementation of the Software Products Eligibility, which were the backbone of the functionality of the new programme, and gave partners a clear line of sight of what they were getting from IBM. This involved building a robust solution that wouldn't slow down the Deal Registration Process
Was involved in the recruitment process

experience.title: Software Developer
description: Worked on the integration with FreshDesk
Led the automated verification of our drivers' VAT Certificates
Built an internal Search Engine using Elasticsearch, PHP and AngularJS
Developed an internal platform for our drivers to upload their driving documents
Identified major IT issues and resolved them, saving 20h of support each week
Analysed the existing work-flow of our internal system to identify and implement operational improvements
Documented features and generated reports for stakeholders
Ensured business' expectations were met at every stage

experience.title: Support Developer
description: Provided technical support on PHP & JS (Bug Fix & Development)
Wrote scripts to automate the execution of business repetitive tasks
Worked alongside the marketing team generating quality data feeds for Google Merchant Center
Created documentation for new starters, reducing the investigation time
Managed tasks among the team, making sure deadlines were met
